name: Don't Melt (Max Rauffer)
description:
Spring has sprung! And that would be great and all, if you weren't made of snow. Now this big jerk of a sun is rubbing it in your face! Even if you can't escape the heat, you don't have to go out like this. Do your best, don't melt! 

Don't Melt is a platforming game where you must avoid the sun as it stalks and chases you through the craggy mountains. Jump, dash, and wall jump to avoid the Sun's charges! 

Controller recommended!

Controls (Xbox Controller):
Move left/right- Analogue stic
Jump- A
Dash- Direction + X / B / Y / Triggers (basically most of the other buttons on the controller dash)

Controls (Keyboard):
Move left/right: A / D / Arrow keys
Jump: Space
Dash: Direction (WASD/Arrow keys) + Left Shift / X 

Gameplay notes:

Touching walls refreshes your jumps and dash!

Dash moves in the direction you are pressing (you can dash up or down too!)

(Controller users: you may have to click Play to start the game if the button isn't yellow)
